item.description:
Saturday dance!! Appears they have these through the summer! OK, this isn't hiking but even though it's Spring it's still cold out and the night still needs filling so let's have some good clean old fashioned dancing!!!

There will be Contra Dancing from 8 PM to 11 PM at the American Legion Post in Wethersfield, CT. Beginner's lessons from 7:30 PM to 8 PM. All are welcome to come to the event (married or single). You don't have to bring a partner. Children are welcome too. Casual dress (best no high heels, though). his venue is non-alcoholic. There is an $12 fee ($5 for students, 12 and under free) the Post charges for entry to cover their costs.

This is a great event with lots of fun. Dress like it is hot out for dancing as you will get hot dancing. Please note there is an overall limit as to how many people can fit in the Post so I have limited RSVP's. Parking is on the street. Just because you RSVP here does not necessarily mean there will be room in the Post if you arrive late.

Location/directions to approximate meetup location at American Legion Post (275 Main Street, Wethersfield, CT):
http://www.mapquest.com/maps?city=Wethersfield&state=CT&address=275+Main+St&zipcode=06109-1822&country=US&latitude=41.71414&longitude=-72.65261&geocode=ADDRESS

American Legion Post in Wethersfield, Contra Dancing information:
1-888-423-0423 (1-888-HCD-0HCD) Ext. 2
http://www.hcdance.org/contra.htm

Definition of Contra Dancing:
Fun: http://www.sbcds.org/contradance/whatis/
Dry: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Contra_dancing

Video clip of some Contra Dancing: http://www.sweetheartflute.com/Barn/ContraDance.wmv

Contra Dance Etiquette:
http://www.tcdancers.org/etiquette.html

Basic Contra Dance steps defined:
http://www.twodogwaltz.com/movesContra.pdf
http://www.tcdancers.org/aboutcontra.html
http://www.tftm.org/contradancing/Dance%20Moves.pdf

=== Legal Stuff ===

By clicking on "Yes" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Guest host Candace will be leading our contingent!

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Contra Dancing at American Legion Post - Wethersfield, CT
